text: Njɨhambar amar. Arɨ irɨh Jerusalemɨŋ awarombɨrarɨŋ amar. Awarorɨŋ mbɨ Wɨramɨnd Nor han ŋe ndɨn wɨram emŋgemŋgand oman insɨŋ ŋgamɨndɨramŋgi amar. Mbɨ ndɨn wɨram kɨra anɨŋnsar hanɨhan Yakŋ Ohɨrandɨv ahaz ore ŋgamamɨnd oman hand insɨŋ mach wɨram kɨra ya Mosesɨnd injambɨr ahe sɨkahɨnd oman hanez insɨŋ ŋgamɨndɨramŋgi amar. Ave ndɨndɨv ya oramɨŋ we ya vɨhe kandɨramŋgi amar. Mbɨ mandari arar kandɨramŋgi amar. Ave mbɨ ndɨn wɨram kɨra yimbɨm emŋgand oman insɨŋ ŋgamɨndɨramŋgi amar.
